sample_clause: 14.6 Interim Payments (a) Subject to Clause 14.1(d), the Employer will within 28 Days after receiving the Statements and all supporting documents including the Progress Report in accordance with Clause 4.23 [Progress Reports], give to the Contractor Notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees, with supporting particulars.
core: The Employer will within 28 Days after receiving the Statements and all supporting documents including the Progress Report in accordance with Clause 4.23 [Progress Reports], give to the Contractor Notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees, with supporting particulars.
entHead_mention: receiving the Statements and all supporting documents
entTail_mention: give to the Contractor Notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees

tail_entity: Employer notifies Contractor about the satisfaction of the Milestone
sample_clause: 14.5 Interim Payments (b)Thereafter, the Employer shall within twenty-eight (28) days after receiving a Statement and all required supporting documents give the Contractor notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees. Without prejudice to the right of set-off the Employer has under Sub-Clause 14.1(e), the undisputed portion of amounts requested in any Statement shall not be withheld, except that#(i)if anything supplied or work done by the Contractor is not in accordance with the Contract, the cost of rectification or replacement may be withheld until rectification or replacement has been completed; and/or (ii)if the Contractor was or is failing to perform any work or obligation in accordance with the Contract, and had been so notified by the Employer, the value of this work or obligation may be withheld until the work or obligation has been performed.
core: 14.5 Interim Payments (b)Thereafter, the Employer shall within twenty-eight (28) days after receiving a Statement and all required supporting documents give the Contractor notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees.
entHead_mention: receiving a Statement and all required supporting documents
entTail_mention: give the Contractor notice of any items in the Statement with which the Employer disagrees

sample_clause: 14.5 Issue of Interim Payment Certificates (b) The Employer shall, within twenty eight (28) days after receiving a Statement and supporting documents, issue to the Contractor an Interim Payment Certificate which shall state the amount which the Employer fairly determines to be due, with supporting particulars.
core: The Employer shall, within twenty eight (28) days after receiving a Statement and supporting documents, issue to the Contractor an Interim Payment Certificate which shall state the amount which the Employer fairly determines to be due, with supporting particulars.
entHead_mention: receiving a Statement and supporting documents
entTail_mention: issue to the Contractor an Interim Payment Certificate which shall state the amount which the Employer fairly determines to be due

sample_clause: Within fifteen (15) Days after the receipt of each valid Application for Payment, Owner and the Financing Parties' Engineer shall review the Application for Payment to verify completion of the Work for which payment is sought, and Owner and the Financing Parties' Engineer shall approve, within such fifteen (15) days, the undisputed portion of the Application for Payment and shall advise Contractor if all or any portion of the application is not approved.
core: Within fifteen (15) Days after the receipt of each valid Application for Payment, Owner and the Financing Parties' Engineer shall review the Application for Payment to verify completion of the Work for which payment is sought, and Owner and the Financing Parties' Engineer shall approve, within such fifteen (15) days, the undisputed portion of the Application for Payment and shall advise Contractor if all or any portion of the application is not approved.
entHead_mention: the receipt of each valid Application for Payment
entTail_mention: review the Application for Payment to verify completion of the Work for which payment is sought, and approve the undisputed portion of the Application for Payment and shall advise Contractor if all or any portion of the application is not approved

sample_clause: GCC 14.7 Payment The Employer shall pay to the Contractor#(a) the first instalment of the advance payment within 42 days after issuing the Letter of Acceptance or within 21 days after receiving the documents in accordance with Sub-Clause 4.2 [Performance Security] and Sub-Clause 14.2 [Advance Payment], whichever is later; (b) the amount certified in each Interim Payment Certificate within 56 days after the Engineer receives the Statement and supporting documents; and (c) the amount certified in the Final Payment Certificate within 56 days after the Employer receives this Payment Certificate. Payment of the amount due in each currency shall be made into the bank account, nominated by the Contractor, in the payment country (for this currency) specified in the Contract.
core: GCC 14.7 Payment The Employer shall pay to the Contractor (b) the amount certified in each Interim Payment Certificate within 56 days after the Engineer receives the Statement and supporting documents;
entHead_mention: the Engineer receives the Statement and supporting documents
entTail_mention: pay to the Contractor (b) the amount certified in each Interim Payment Certificate

sample_clause: 14.3 Application for Interim Payments 14.3.1 The Contractor shall submit a Statement to the Employer after the end of each month, in a form approved by the Employer, showing in detail the sum that the Contractor considers to be due on the Due Date for Payment and the basis on which that sum is calculated, together with supporting documents which shall include the relevant report on progress in accordance with Sub?Clause 4.20.2 [Progress Reports]. The Due Date for Payment shall be 56 days after receipt and confirmation by the Employer of such statement and after the corresponding invoice has been sent by E-Mail.
core: 14.3.1 The Contractor shall submit a Statement to the Employer after the end of each month, in a form approved by the Employer, showing in detail the sum that the Contractor considers to be due on the Due Date for Payment and the basis on which that sum is calculated, together with supporting documents which shall include the relevant report on progress in accordance with Sub?Clause 4.20.2 [Progress Reports]. The Due Date for Payment shall be 56 days after receipt and confirmation by the Employer of such statement and after the corresponding invoice has been sent by E-Mail.
entHead_mention: receipt and confirmation by the Employer of statement showing in detail the sum that the Contractor considers to be due on the Due Date for Payment and the basis on which that sum is calculated, together with supporting documents

sample_clause: 7.3 Conditions to Scheduled Payments At any time after the later of#(a) the date which is Seven (7) days prior to the date specified in the Milestone Schedule as being the scheduled date for achievement of the relevant Milestone (the Scheduled Date ); and (b) the date which the Local Contractor reasonably expects is Seven (7) days prior to the date upon which it will successfully achieve the relevant Milestone, the Local Contractor may apply for payment of the amount of the Contract Price set opposite the relevant Milestone and, (i) if the Owner's Engineer certifies that the Local Contractor has achieved the relevant Milestone, the Owner shall pay or cause to be paid such amount by a check available to the Local Contractor within forty four (44) days after the application submittal date (the Check Available Date ) and will be two (2) working days after the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment (the Payment Date ). The Local Contractor shall issue an original invoice which shall be dated and submitted to the Owner on the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment; (ii) if the achievement of such Milestone occurs after the Scheduled Date for that Milestone and the Owner s Engineer certifies that the Local Contractor has achieved the relevant Milestone, the Owner shall pay or cause to be paid such amount by a check available to the Local Contractor within forty four (44) days after the application submittal date (the Check Available Date ) and will be two (2) working days after the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment (the Payment Date ). The Local Contractor shall issue an original invoice which shall be dated and submitted to the Owner on the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment.
core: 7.3 Conditions to Scheduled At any time after the later of#(i) if the Owner's Engineer certifies that the Local Contractor has achieved the relevant Milestone, the Owner shall pay or cause to be paid such amount by a check available to the Local Contractor within forty four (44) days after the application submittal date (the Check Available Date ) and will be two (2) working days after the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment (the Payment Date ).
entHead_mention: the issuance date of the Certificate of Payment (the Payment Date )
entTail_mention: the Owner shall pay or cause to be paid such amount

sample_clause: (c) Owner¡¯s Approval of Applications for Payment. Within five (5) Business Days after Owner¡¯s receipt of any Application for Payment in accordance with Section 5.4(a), Owner shall notify Contractor in writing of (i) any inaccuracies, missing documentation or of any other reason why the requirements for approval of the Application for Payment have not been met, (ii) any inaccuracies of the amounts contemplated in the relevant Application for Payment to be invoiced by the Contractor, as applicable, against the Owner. Contractor shall promptly cure any inaccuracies, missing documentation or other issues identified by Owner and resubmit a new Application for Payment and the Parties shall undertake an iterative process as set forth herein until the Application for Payment is in a form agreed upon by the Parties. Amounts approved by Owner shall be payable to Contractor, as applicable, within twenty (20) calendar days from the approval of the Application for Payment and Contractor shall provide the corresponding invoice to the Owner no later than two (2) Business Days following the approval of the Application for Payment, for the sake of clarity it shall be understood that Contractor shall only be entitled to issue one (1) Application for Payment and one (1) invoice per month.
core: Amounts approved by Owner shall be payable to Contractor, as applicable, within twenty (20) calendar days from the approval of the Application for Payment.
entHead_mention: the approval of the Application for Payment.
entTail_mention: Amounts approved by Owner shall be payable to Contractor
